tasks.label: Incremental Compile
tasks.command: python tools/removeOutdatedClassFiles.py && mvn -f ltexls/pom.xml '-Dmaven.test.skip=true' compile && mvn -f ltexls/pom.xml jar:jar appassembler:assemble antrun:run@patch-bin-scripts

tasks.label: Clean and Run Tests
tasks.command: mvn -f ltexls-languagetool-patch/pom.xml clean && mvn -f ltexls/pom.xml clean && mvn -f ltexls-languagetool-patch/pom.xml install && mvn -f ltexls/pom.xml verify

tasks.label: Run Tests
tasks.command: mvn -f ltexls-languagetool-patch/pom.xml install && mvn -f ltexls/pom.xml verify
